original_text: Solomon began to build the temple on the second day of the second month of the fourth year that he ruled Israel as king. Chronicles 2 Chronicles 4
korean_text: 솔로몬이 왕위에 오른 지 넷째 해 둘째 달 둘째 날 건축을 시작하였더라

sentences.original_text: Solomon began to build the temple
on the second day of the second month
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 달의 이틀째 되는 날에

sentences.original_text: of the fourth year that he ruled Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이스라엘을 다스린 네 번째 해에
